info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-platform-software-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for monitoring platform software in a Network Element.
     Copyright (c) 2017-2019, 2022-2025 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Platform & Hardware
**Paths:** 23

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-platform-software-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-platform-software-oper.yang)
